thread.title: Charlotte
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Charlotte

author: Charlotte
title: Charlotte
text: Thank you for the good cycling shoe find. The cycling shoe matched what I currently use, so I didn't have to upgrade to new Sworks model, that was way out of my budget, or compromise on something else. Glad you keep older, high-end quality equipment. I appreciate the excellent products being offered online, expedited order-mail service, and very good value.
